Name: Alien Earth
About the game: In the distance future, an alien race known as the Raksha have taken over the Earth, and you have been selected to be the prey in one of their deadly games. Released into the jungle to run for your life, you must face not only the dangerous mutations brought about by man's nuclear assaults, but a vicious Raksha Lord as well. Legends speak of great ruined cities, brave freedom fighters, and even more wonderous things that lie beyond the jungle. Will you have the strength and cunning to survive to find out? FEATURES - Lush, fully-rendered 3D graphics draw you into the adventure - Hours of intense gameplay - Hundreds of detailed animations - Dramatic rendered cinematic cut scenes - Fully-digitized voices - Intriguing storyline with dozens of characters, each with their own exciting personality
